subject: Affiliate Commission Rate
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,

I hope you are doing well! It has been very positive to see that there has been a number of sales made using my referral link - thanks again for reaching out to collaborate!

I did notice however, that I appear to be in the v1 members tier on the commission side when I should be in the v2 members according to the size of my following. All of my commissions earned so far have therefore been lower than expected - especially now as I have gone above $4000 in sales.

I would be very appreciative if my tier could be changed and the commissions adjusted accordingly.

Wishing you a great week ahead!

Kind regards,

Daragh Kennedy (MpowR)

conversations.body_text: Hi Daragh Kennedy,    We've adjusted your commission rate accordingly. However, the previous commission system will not be recalculated. Thank you for your understanding.
